scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model in a consumer banking context.  The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer protected customer attributes such as income or credit score, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Evaluate the accuracy and robustness of the customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: A large national bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn. The model is trained on a dataset containing sensitive customer information.
